text: San Ramon is a city in Contra Costa County, California, United States, located 34 miles east of San Francisco, and within the San Ramon Valley. San Ramon's population was as 84,605 at the 2020 census, making it the 4th largest city in Contra Costa County, after Concord, Richmond, and Antioch. It shares borders with Danville to the north and Dublin to the south. == References == Category:Cities in California Category:Cities in the San Francisco Bay Area Category:Settlements in Contra Costa County, California
title: San Ramon, California
